summary: This mod adds in my character from my PS3 (he naturally uses archmage robes and dragonscale armor but I recently made him a master nightingale) This mod adds him in exactly where i left off...
descriptionHtml: [b][i]Need A New companion? Someone who never dies? Look no further this is the mod for you! This mod adds a nightingale follower to the game who is automatically your friend and follower. (no voice acting D:) Trengor can be found in the Sleeping giant inn (located in riverwood) I dont recommend using him as a follower until at least completing "the way of the voice"[/i][/b]
author: _trengor_
